description: Erection of a part single storey, part double storey rear extension with conversion of garage to habitable use including amendments to fenestration, following demolition of existing single storey rear extension and conservatory.
decision_conditions: The proposal by reason of its scale, massing and poor overall design would represent an unduly intrusive and incongruous form of development which would fail to harmonise with the architectural composition of the original dwelling and would be detrimental to the character, appearance and visual amenities of the surrounding area. Therefore, the proposed development would be contrary to Policy BE1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan (November 2012), Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12 and DMHD 1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan - Part Two (2020) and Policies D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Chapter 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
